locations: Willmore Wilderness Park, Improvement District No. 25, Alberta, Canada
imdb.plot outline: For the past two centuries people have been making their homes on the eastern slopes of the Canadian Rockies. Where did they come from? How did they survive and what has become of their legacy? Join Bazil Leonard and his son Bill, on a journey as they explore the rich history of the most remote region in Willmore Wilderness Park. Ghosts on the Jackpine River is episode 9 of the 13-part Canadian Rockies Series, a collection of stories sharing the history, culture and traditions of Alberta's eastern slopes.
imdb.title: Ghosts on the Jackpine River
plot: For the past two centuries people have been making their homes on the eastern slopes of the Canadian Rockies. Where did they come from? How did they survive and what has become of their legacy? Join Bazil Leonard and his son Bill, on a journey as they explore the rich history of the most remote region in Willmore Wilderness Park. _Ghosts on the Jackpine River_ (qv) is episode 9 of the 13-part Canadian Rockies Series, a collection of stories sharing the history, culture and traditions of Alberta's eastern slopes.
